source: This tree is too healthy to cut down.
translation: העץ הזה בריא מכדי לחטוב אותו.

source: Maybe I should become a tree surgeon.
translation: אולי אני צריך להיות מנתח עצים.

source: I'll show you this marble I found.
Sorry, I can't play now, Merith...
That's ok, Herman.  You can keep it.
translation: זה בסדר, הרמן, אתה יכול לשמור אותו.

source: But I sharpened it just for you!
He won't let go of the saw.
Place each in order on a plate...
I think I hid that one somewhere near...
That is all I can recall.
You will have to choose from whatever lies about.
You are the Master of Scrolls.
Write him one to aid his quest.
I solved the birth- stones quest...
...and I have not tried playing the flute.
She lives just across Shadowland I think...
The labyrinth begins at Serpent's Grotto.
There are horrible beasts in there!
Are you taking orders for cheese?
This is Brandon, you old dolt.
The one on a quest to overthrow Malcolm's power.
He's had writer's block for years.
translation: היה לו מחסום כתיבה במשך שנים.

source: Perhaps the crisis has inspired him.
Are you saying I scattered papers about just to look busy?
Could YOU brush a dragon's teeth?
Do I smell cats on your breath?
Is it my fault I don't eat knights?
If you'd just stop your dancing Cramden...
...and bring me what I asked for!
You still have not given me the quill I need.
For mystics with no magic left...
...you all seem to have an awful lot.
...and soon no spells of ours will work.
So take the scroll, and use it later.
What are you doing back here, Burton?
You must find Zanthia in Faeriewood.
You'd better get back to Faeriewood and complete your quests!
There is already a scroll there.
Isn't this the trophy from last year's Kyrandia Days 3-leg relay race?
He'll have a fit if he sees you.
Ha, I'd like to see the gophers try to get to my flowers now.
translation: חה, נראה את החולדים האלה מנסים להגיע לפרחים שלי עכשיו.

source: My old sandbox makes a great planter.
translation: ארגז החול הישן שלי נהדר בתור אדנית.

source: At least I won't have to wash the windows today.
translation: לפחות אני לא צריך לנקות את החלונות היום.

source: ...but I guess we should have used the boards to make a front door.
translation: ...אבל אולי היינו צריכים להשתמש בקרשים כדי לבנות דלת כניסה.

source: I don't suppose the moths will annoy him now.
translation: לא נראה לי שהעשים יציקו לו עכשיו.

source: Hmm - I think I can almost see the castle from here.
So, YOU'RE the hero thrown against me?
Were there none to test me better?
Do you believe in all Brynn's lies?
Perhaps your MOTHER should assist you.
But YOURS lives, for surely, SHE has dressed you!
Be careful, boy.  Do not insult a man with knives.
Please move aside. I seek the cave.
No bother sir. You missed the mark.
I must return your gift, kind sir.
I leave you now, and dodge your sorrow...
...but I may NOT be nice tomorrow.
It's the closest thing to birdseed I've got.
Why would a sick bird want that?
How can his wing bend like that?
...he'll have to give me a feather, won't he?
Hope this qualifies as a quill.
You got hit on the head, and I dragged you in here.
You were a child the last time I saw you.
Did Darm and Brynn at least get all the gems activated on your amulet?
They said they didn't have much magic left.
Why don't you just go up to the castle and give it a try with what you've got?
I'll go, but how will I get there?
He recommended I come see you.
Okay, I'll give you what I can, but I don't care if you are the Prince...
...I'm not giving up my wardrobe spell or my enchanted aquarium!
I can't believe they would do this!
I'll get things set up for your potions.
The fountain is ruined, and there is no water.
Without magic water, none of my potions are possible.
This cauldron can mix up potions that when combined will give the ability to fly to the castle.
But you need the water, right?
...or I can wring some out of the moss.
Now what's this about a Prince?
Bring the magic water from the fountain first...
Your parents were King William and Queen Katherine...
Did you know Malcolm murdered them and seized the Kyragem?
We had him locked in the castle.  But now he's loose.
If I free the gem, can I get revenge?
I'm sure the vestments have been lost.
You'll need luck, if nothing else.
Only you can do it now.
It looks thick, like blue syrup.
A beautiful color, but what is it?
Why would I want her laundry water?
The concoction seems to be only half-complete.
It smells like a strange combination of herbs and spices.
I only use the freshest ingredients!
This doesn't look like a blueberry!
Rats. I wish I could find one of her cookbooks.
These blueberries are not freshly picked.
This doesn't look like a blueberry
We need the magic water Brandon.
These look better than my garden.
I wonder if there's fish back under the ground?
I'd hate to lose this in the spring.
Someone should bottle this water and sell it!
Quite a flow for such a small spring.
That big rock on the bottom looks pretty.
I wish I had time to soak my feet.
This window looks great at night when the temple candles are lit.
translation: החלון הזה מרהיב ביופיו בלילה כשנרות המקדש דולקים.

source: She wants me to get flowers?!
I would never cut this tree down!
I wonder if that Malcolm made this tree sick?
translation: אני תוהה אם מלקולם גרם לעץ הזה לחלות?

source: Ugh.  Something sticky is oozing out.
This is the first time I've ever seen Darm standing up.
He didn't get Brandywine too, did he?
It doesn't look like Darm had many things.
I have nothing to light this with.
I don't have time to sit and rest.
Aren't you going to fix it?
Sure, but I don't know how!
I meant to replace the bad planks but you know how time flies by.
I hope nobody important tried to cross.
Can't you just get some new planks and rope?
I just need to cut new planks!
But I don't have anything to cut them with.
I'll see what I can do.
I'll get to work on cutting some wood for new planks.
I hope he doesn't cut his leg off!
It's the only musical instrument Grandfather knows how to play.
Well, I guess I'll try to cut some new planks.
I wonder if I can find something that will help him fix the bridge.
I don't think that will help him fix the bridge.
I wonder if I can make it across to the other side?
That rope does look pretty chancy...
Better to play it safe, I guess...
But I still think I could have made it.
I think I can make it across.
All that's left is that thin rope...
...and even that looks like it's about to go.
You're not saying I'm clumsy are you?
I'm in charge here, and if anything happened to you, I'd get blamed!
At least let me get close so that if you fall in--
Now they'll MAKE me fix the bridge!
I guess I'll play it safe...
Enlighten Darm with your presence, not me.
I am collecting magic to fight Malcolm.
There is one songbird left, but...
It is hurt and cannot sing.
But I still need a quill.
If you would harvest, you must sow!
Can't you see I'm trying to rest?
I tried to carve my name on this...
I've never seen a muddy bird.
What do I have to do?
I placed the second correct gemstone!
I placed the third correct gemstone!
It feels like some unseen force is pulling my gemstone toward the gold dish.
What am I?  A masonry inspector?
How do they get this so smooth?
I'm coming to get you and I've got a flute now!
The magical dish is now gone.
It vanished in a burst of flames!
It is being pushed away from the dish by some unseen force.
A mirror -- I can see myself.
Now I think he's really mad!
I have a few tricks up my sleeve.
At this moment I only seek water from the fountain.
My finger bath is boring now...
Perhaps some hide and seek will amuse us both.
If you need water, you'll have to fix the fountain first.
I cannot tell you where to look.
For that is neither fair nor fun!
If I get these shoes wet I'll never make it to the castle.
I wonder if she knows she's spilling?
Rats!  I'd like to pry one of these off!
Uh-Oh, maybe these teeth can be repaired.
translation: או-או, אולי אפשר לתקן את השיניים האלה.

source: Why do I keep touching this?
Are you Brandon, grandson of Kallak?
translation: האם אתה ברנדון, נכדו של חיליק?

source: We are of the Other Kingdom.
Why would the Land speak to me?
Magic spells of an evil intent have upset the balance of nature.
translation: לחשי קסם למטרות רוע הפרו את האיזון בטבע.

source: Can't you use your magic to fight this evil?
translation: לא תוכלו להשתמש בקסם שלכם כדי להילחם ברוע?

source: Evil exists only in the Kingdom of Man.
translation: הרוע קיים רק בממלכת בני האדם.

source: But-- why is this happening now?
The magic Kyragem, symbol of the trust between our kingdoms, has been corrupted.
translation: הקירגלית הקסומה, הסמל לאמון שבין הממלכות, הושחתה.

source: Now, it can no longer protect us.
translation: כעת, אינה יכולה היא להגן עלינו עוד.

source: You, Brandon, must oppose on our behalf.
You have been chosen, Grandson of Kallak.
Your destiny was forged before your birth.
But I wouldn't know where to start.
translation: אבל אין לי מושג היכן להתחיל.

source: Let your faith guide you, Brandon.
translation: תן לאמונתך להראות לך את הדרך, ברנדון.

source: I thought my sandals were in here.
I think there's already something in there.
translation: נדמה לי שכבר יש משהו בפנים.

source: I can see plenty of dead trees from here.
translation: אני רואה מכאן המון עצים מתים.

source: I'll have to go get her.
Should I lay Grandfather on the bed?
I don't think there's any way to move him.
translation: לא נראה לי שיש דרך להזיז אותו.

source: I can't take this, he'll need the light.
translation: לא אוכל לקחת את זה, הוא יזדקק לאור.
אחלה כריכות, אבל חומר הקריאה מעפן.

source: I don't want to carry this around!
translation: אני לא רוצה להיסחב עם זה!

source: I don't think he can chew.
Perhaps my magic can heal Grandfather...
translation: אולי הקסם שלי יוכל לרפא את סבא...

source: I should plant one of these in our yard.
Is this thatch, or just weeds thrown on the roof?
Bring me something good and I'll trade for the chalice.
Fine, I'll play your little game.
How about a big, juicy apple?
I'm not tall enough to pick apples!
Well, where did you hide my chalice?
I hid MY chalice outside, you big oaf.
Go outside and take a look.
Blueberries are okay, but I eat them all the time.
Since I'm so small, they're easy to pick.
No, I said I want something good.
I don't need anything else from you.
Go outside and look for the chalice.
I don't need anything else from you...
Ever thought of putting in some stairs?
It would make your other furnishings look bad by comparison.
By the way, where is my chalice?
I have hidden it in a very safe place.
Give me something good and I'll give it to you.
I see you got passed my puppies!
But since you've made it, you'll have to stay.
You will not be able to leave this island.
I have but 2 rules here in my home:
Do not disturb my morning naps...
A friend of yours now serves me here.
Oh Herman... Herman... Brandon is here!
Hmmm?  I don't know where he is...
...but I'm sure that he'll find you.
He really wants to return your saw.
I can't wait to smack him!
I keep expecting banana peels here.
...but I know I can take it!
(Thought I'd sneak around the other way, huh?)
Let go of the branch, Merith.
I'm not playing with you anymore!
Ow !  I hope this is what Brynn wants.
I already picked the rose that used to be there.
That fits tight even without glue!
The altar radiates an intense magic.
Hey, this is going to be easy!
This altar used to glow with magic.
It certainly has a healthy glow!
Looks like some kind of magical force field.
Why don't you go visit Brynn in the temple?
Oh, so now you're in a hurry.
If you watch, it's going to cost you extra.
I'd let you help, but I don't like to loan tools.
Well, this saw of yours could use a sharpening.
Don't you have something else to do?
It's still gonna take a while to get through this tree.
Brynn... I always took her for granite.
She was always so kind to me.
Looks like it might storm pretty soon.
I can't think of sleep at a time like this.
Judging by the decor, this must have been Brynn's bedroom.
I'll try this on you Brynn...
Look's like they're filled with dust.
I wouldn't dare drink anything from that!
This place sure has a strange floorplan!
I'm not jumping all the way down there!
Finally, somebody has a front door.
That troublesome little Faun lives in there.
Wish I knew how to swim.
Is that where the castle is?
Whoa!  Someone hid this inside the stump!
I guess there's nothing else in there.
Ha!  Does he think I'm stupid?
Now I have the Crystal Ball.
Rats!  And me with no hot-dogs.
I think I'm in trouble now!
I'd like to find this Malcolm.
I have been waiting for so long!
Can you take me with you?
I am glad to see you and would like to go with you when you leave.
You will recall, I entered first.
Why don't you finish it yourselves...
We serve the Master of Tides and Love.
But YOU could do it, though.
And then we all could go!
WE only know how to float, and we could teach you.
If I can think of what to do...
The whole place is lit up with moonlight!
One of the gems on my amulet is now glowing purple!
I'll bet something fits in there...
The moonstone is locked in place.
There is already a moonstone there.
Wow! The walls are made of emerald!
Maybe these will help me find my way in the dark.
I can't see a thing in here!
I wonder if my green hat is still down there?
The well is now filled with fresh water!
I wish I hadn't done that.
Oops.  I hope I don't need that later.
There's my initials right on the side there.
Looks like I'll need to toss in more rocks.
It must need more rocks, though.
I don't think that this is heavy enough to counteract that hanging weight.
The iron grate must be attached to the dish and counterweight mechanism.
That torch is bolted in place.
I found a note on his bench.
translation: מצאתי את הפתק הזה על שולחנו.

source: He has been turned to stone!
I don't know how it happened!
Perhaps there is a clue at your home.
Amulet...Lavender Rose?  What does this mean?
He'll use his spiteful magic to destroy Kyrandia.
It will take all that we can gather to match Malcolm.
Noble Kallak can only be saved by defeating Malcolm.
Find a lavender rose for me...
...and I shall create an enchantment to help you.
Each passing minute dilutes our strength.
Use the rose wisely and the royal amulet will be yours.
In time, it will enable you to wield great power.
In order to obtain the amulet...
...you must place this rose upon the silver altar.
Then you must find Darm.  He lives in the Timbermist Woods.
He may be able to help you.
Please show me the note, Brandon.
translation: הראה לי את הפתק בבקשה, ברנדון.

source: This is not what we are looking for.
Maybe there is a better clue.
translation: אולי יש שם רמז מוצלח יותר.

source: Did you find a clue, Brandon?
Please bring me a lavender rose.
You must place your silver rose on the silver altar.
I'll bet this incense burner is why Brynn always smells so good.
translation: הקטורת הזו היא בודאי הסיבה שלברין יש תמיד ריח נעים כל כך.

source: I thought that was a spitoon.
Hmm, no donations accepted I guess.
Boy, this floor sure is slippery.
Have you brought me the note?
Did you bring the lavender rose, Brandon?
Did you get the amulet already, Brandon?
I think I like it better inside.
Looks like alot of Zanthia's useless stuff.
I think this must have been Zanthia's bedroom.
Well...I...uh...didn't know you'd want it back.
But, I'll go find it right away!
Hmm, don't these usually fall off when they're ripe?
The acorn that was here has been picked.
That emerald is really wedged in there.
You'd think there'd be some birds on this.
This looks like an old mystic.
Doesn't look like Malcolm is bothering the Kyrandian Garden Club.
This key doesn't fit this keyhole.
There's nothing I can do with it when I'm like this.
Hmm?  Blank, except it has Brynn's name on it!
translation: הממ? ריק, אבל השם של ברין כתוב עליו!

source: I'd better go to the temple.
Brynn will know what to do!
Smells like a rose to me.
Yum!  A small snack is nice.
Hey, one of the jewels on my amulet is blue now!
translation: היי, אחת מאבני החן על הקמע שלי כחולה פתאום!

source: This potion should help me get in there.
I caught this teardrop at the Pool of Sorrow.
I caught this teardrop by this pool.
A nice addition to my marble colection.
Delicious!  I hope they aren't poisonous.
That last note shattered the ice!
I didn't think my playing was THAT bad.
I made the flames go out!
I guess I'll give it a shot...
This scroll is starting to pay off!
Hmm.  Nothing happened, but I feel like going somewhere else.
I thought this was a dead starfish.
A garnet this big must be very valuable.
translation: נופך גדול שכזה בודאי בעל ערך רב.

source: It's shaped like a perfect triangle.
This diamond glitters in the sunlight.
This emerald is my favorite color.
This pearl must have come from the sea.
It was dangerous getting this ruby.
Hmm,  isn't this Di Magno Ferro, Sil Quad Oxylate?
What a curious combination of colors.
Looks like a huge cough drop.
This is the darkest gem I have ever seen.
This stone is warm to the touch.
This jewel glows with its own inner-light.
This rare gem has a tiny rainbow inside it.
Oh look, it's got half a worm in it.
This rose tingles in my hand.
I wonder what a floornut tastes like?
Could this be carved from emerald?
What am I thinking?  It's empty!
This is way too big for my head!
This probably isn't to the restroom!
Pretty tasty! I was getting hungry.
No more meat left on this.
It feels like I'm completely weightless.
Why do I have to do everything?
translation: מדוע אני זה שחייב לעשות הכל?

source: I wish I had a horse to ride.
translation: הלוואי שהיה לי איזה סוס לרכוב עליו.

source: I can't believe they let this happen!
translation: אני לא מאמין שנתנו לזה לקרות!

source: Too bad I can't take a quick nap!
I think I'm getting a rash!
You'd think somebody would have a map of this place!
It seems like these caverns go on forever.
Eeeu!  I got pitch all over my vest!
How am I supposed to know what to do!?
I'm starving!  I never did get lunch!
Who would notice if I just went home?
I'd do anything for a pair of sandals!
What gall you show to break my rule!
Do you wish to fight me now?
Or will you heed your mommy's plea?
Did your Grandpa knit that vest?
You're warning ME? At last, a joke!
I told you no, but still you must?
There's no more room on the pillow.
I hope this is the correct spot to lay the sceptre.
I wonder if this is where the crown belongs?
I think the chalice probably belongs on this pillow.
All the royal vestments are placed...
...but are they in the correct order?
I already put a potion in there.
I don't think an empty vial will work here.
I doubt an empty vial will work here.
It's shape doesn't match the engraving.
I hope I'm not supposed to sing now!
Hopefully she can be restored too.
Too bad I can't light this.
This could have been Grandfather's room...
There is nothing else hidden behind the portrait.
I don't know if this will work...
The ruby that once grew there is now gone.
I guess this didn't fit Malcolm's head.
That book is marked "P" for Potions.
That book is marked "G" for Gemlore.
That book is marked "A" for Alchemy.
That book is marked "M" for Magic.
That book is marked "E" for Enchantment.
That book is marked "N" for Nature.
That book is marked "R" for Royalty.
That book is marked "O" for Opals.
My baby!  I knew you'd come!
You have grown up handsome, son.
I use them only to seek your revenge!
You must free the Kyragem to reclaim your throne.
Malcolm is vile and deserves to die!
Do not waste your powers on destruction, my son.
You will require the Royal Chalice...
It is all I can give.
I wish I could do something to honor their memory.
I think one flower was enough.
I don't think I should use this to pay my respects.
I don't want to put anything else on their graves.
I can't get to the upper level from here.
Hmm.  Well, that did something, but they're still locked!
Hmm.  These doors look important, but they're locked!
Where are these tears coming from?
Is this whole pool filled with tears?
I wouldn't drink it on a bet.
I bet I can catch a teardrop!
There must be a way to get across.
I can't get across in my present form.
I can't get back across in my present form.
I wonder what sort of fertilizer would be best?
Are you a nut tree or what?
You don't happen to have any manure...
Aren't you going to give me something?
Thank you for "Restoring Life to the Deadwood Glade"...
...and "In Token of which", I dust you now.
You got it in my nose!
Am I stronger now, or what?
I suppose that's up to you.
I've done my part, so if you don't mind...
I'll get back to my own problems.
Doesn't look like a promising spot to start a new garden..
Should I soak these seeds overnight before planting?
It has to be as big as a dog!
I know there are seeds in here, but I want to eat it.
I'd better not drop it in the hole.
It may come in handy, later.
I think you'll need it in THIS neighborhood.
Where have all the seals gone?
I'd rather be fishing I suppose.
What's the Royal Chalice doing here?
I think I'm getting a rash.
I'd swear some of these trees look just like the ones in our backyard!
I'll try it on the chalice.
Maybe these will help me find my way in the dark.
I can't see a thing in here!
